data.suggestion: An angry Rose demands Trace tell his fiancée that it’s too early to start decorating the manor for Christmas. Meanwhile in a tangle of ribbons and lights, Flora seems to have done a better job of decorating herself.
{Modern Pop AU} Flora, Kat, Raine, Nat and Laura in a all girl singing group. Their group would be named like “Keidran-X” and Flora and Kat would be the leaders.
A Riftwall Holidays: Maeve and her cousins watch hungrily as Adira and Amelia put the finishing touches on the Riftwall family holiday dinner.
Willow body pillow!
Redraw of the main panel from page 435 - Kat preparing to massage Flora
A beauty pageant with female Clovis, Natani, Raine, Flora, and Kathrin as contestants dressed in pageant dresses.
Trace and Flora reenact the balcony scene from Romeo and Juliet
Kathrin is split into two: her dog half and her cat half, and they interact.
w0lf's Ember in the Night of the living pants
Templar version of the 'Our Friends' poster from V: The Original Miniseries, featuring Brahn and an elderly tiger couple.
Karen reveals some of her own private fears and worries to Maddie while they're in the dungeon, showing a different side of herself.
Gobble-Gobble Part 2: Natani finds Keith down the hall from Trace and Flora's room, laughing his tail off!
Modern AU: A child Laura visits her local GameGo with her parents to get her very first console.
More content on Young Nora. Who was that guy she met and what happened after she followed him into the village?
Sequel to Kat’s Fertility Wish: Kat goes to deliver some food to Zen like normal, not realizing how her newly activated estrus might complicate things.
WWII Tigress Trace in a US Army Airforce Dress Uniform sitting on the wing of a P-40
Flora Dakimakura 2020 redraw
Flora meets Tigger and tries to bounce on her tail like him
Vampire Kat 2: Willing Prey - Thanksgiving - TwoKinds fans and Kat simps organize a surprise Thanksgiving themed blood drive
Sam tells Colin he is a good boy
Maren winning first prize at a dog grooming contest, with an upset Sythe as her 'dog'
Biological differences between the 3 main species (and maybe Windstraw's?)
Anthro Nibbly Butler
During Eric's early travels, he comes across an island of Turkey anthros
Winter fun. Trace building a snowman, Flora building a snow-cat, Natani building a snow-wolf, and Keith build a snow-basitin.
Portrait or full-body of Flora in a painted style, similar to the ones of Kat and Roselyn. (Maybe in a wild yoga position?)
Kat’s introduction page scene but as very cat Kat, she nuzzles Trace’s calf/leg to greet him, Flora is equally jealous. Trace is just happy to see a kitty.
Vampire Rose lounging seductively on the couch dressed in a Slave Leia costume
Very cat Kat 2: in her especially feline state, Kat is hired by Amelia to work at the tavern. She introduces herself to Windstraw, who is confused and conflicted with the addition to the team.
AU Maddie and Maeve discovered a photo booth and are now taking weird photos
Cozy Flora sips hot cocoa by the fire
Mike kisses Evals who is reluctant at first, but then gets more into it (both male)
Nora as a victim of snow leopard curse
(Modern AU) Natani and Keith's actors go on a nice date for Thanksgiving, with both planning on proposing during it.
Raine finally manages to fix Nibblified Maren, separating her from Nibbly, only to become squirrified herself - an albino squirrel Raine.
Laura sharing some embarrassing stories about Keith with Natani
Past Trace and current Trace as twins in the Templar college of magic. Competing to impress head master Nora.
Raine's magic goes wrong. Explosion ruins room resulting bustier and curvier wolf Raine
Mrs. Nibbly tries taking part in the no nut November challenge... But she just cant resist those delicious peanuts!
Laura learning to drive. She receives driving lessons from her friend, Willow.
Girls Night 3: Sythe and Zen getting boozed and flirting with the cute wolfess sitting next to them... not recognizing each other in their female forms.
Zen as Dante and Natani as Vergil from Devil May Cry 5
Due to magical shenanigans, Stoney is turned into a real lizardman! (who is still not wearing any clothes)
Natani, Zen and Keith as the Spanish Inquisition from Monty Python. Nobody expects the Spanish Inquisition!!
Half-Keidran Raine meets human Holo from the “Spice and Wolf”.
What if the estate's attempt to turn Clovis into a chicken half-worked?
Amnesia: The Legacy Descent. Trace as Daniel from Amnesia: The Dark Descent, running away from a monster in the Brennenburg Castle.
Flora holding her leg up to her head to show off her flexibility skills.
Brutus meets Clovis’s real sister who starts flirting with him, making fem Clovis very jealous
No-Nut-November Nora. Apparently Nora doesn't like nuts during November.
Eric and Kat shooting clay pigeons.
Rose and Saria wake up after a night of hard partying and wonder if anything happened between them.
Trace and Flora invited to a "mix race couples Island retreat" to meet other mix race couples on a private get away. PS friends welcome PPS: NO Eric Vaughan allowed.
A regular wolf raised by wolf Keidran
Laura’s Keidran-Cola ad (Laura at the beach enjoying a refreshing bottle of Keidran-Cola)
Double date: Trace and Flora go on a date together, with Sythe and Maren joining them.

Nora gets a taste of her own medicine when a curse backfires, forcing herself to act like a dog for the day. Trace, finding this hilarious, rubs her belly and wonders aloud what tricks she can do. "Don't you dare!"
Landen, Sealeen and Seraphina sitting around a campfire, resting after a tough mission.
Young Rose Daki
Trace as V, Flora as Evey Hammond from V for Vendetta in the scene where V first blows up the Old Bailey (Templar Tower)
Weresnep aftermath, Red finds himself trapped on a bed with sleeping weresneped Kat, Raine, and Maren. He tries to escape without waking his fluffy companions.
Natani trying to be cute for Keith, and Keith can’t decide if he wants to stare, or look away out of embarrassment
Kat surrenders to her canine side and rolls over for some belly rubs
Laura as a white mage from Final Fantasy XIV
Natani body pillow
VV Mike and Kat wake up the morning after the Halloween party
Maddie accidentally triggers the cure for Karen's cursed ears. Both frantically try to get them back, while Trace is reluctant to apply a curse on Karen again.
Keith as John Wick in a frenzy, avenging the killing of his Wolf
Sequel to "Island Style Reni." Reni's clothes have been stolen by Seraphina, who is gushing over them, while a mortified Reni has to deal with being in the nude, bare and blushing.
Natani as Mulan training under Keith as Li Shang, respectively, from the animated Disney's 'Mulan'. Nora as Mushu peaking in the background.
Sequel to https://www.patreon.com/posts/doomguy-daisy-20030240 where the Doom Slayer and Daisy are in the Fortress of Doom, with an annoyed Samuel Hayden in the background
Very Tigress Flora
Modern AU Laura/Kat clothes shopping with Willow, maybe Nora could try to sneak in more raunchy clothes?
Anthro Reni Daki
Undercover Maddie Finale. Maddie has safely made her way back home and is preparing to give a report on what was learned... But... What DID we learn???
Pirates of the Caribbean: Captain Flora and her secrets
Flora, Kat, and Laura are characters in the "Twokinds High" dating sim.
Flora and Natani swap personalities. Flora becomes serious and reserved, wearing the wraps. Natani acts like Flora: cute, carefree and unclothed. Trace and Keith are very confused.
Hide and seek with Ms. Nibbly! She is hiding somewhere in this picture
Dark AU Emperor Sythe and his High Generals Evals and Mike rally their armies to conquer the world
To continue Maeve's Splinter Cell training, Maddie tries to demonstrate incapacitation techniques on Brutus, but can't make them work her sturdy Keidran victim even as he cheerfully gives her tips.
Kat is finally convinced Flora is not "just fat" as she nears the end of her pregnancy.
TK History: Young Sythe's first experiences in a Human village.
Heartthrob - Evals pulls Mike out of harm's way and into his chest. Mike gets flustered hearing Evals's heartbeat.
Trace and Saria's first date with Nora as a wingman.
